trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ControlType.Document"></xref> control types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Espone <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ControlType.Document"> </xref> tipi di controllo a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The DocumentAutomationPeer represents documents and supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: Il DocumentAutomationPeer rappresenta documenti e supporta <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>

trans-unit.source: Objects such as a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> can contain embedded objects, such as images and hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti come un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>può contenere oggetti incorporati, ad esempio immagini e i collegamenti ipertestuali.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: Initially, when you try to get the child elements of the document, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName> does not return the embedded objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizialmente, quando si tenta di ottenere gli elementi del documento, figlio <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>non restituisce gli oggetti incorporati.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To get the embedded elements, obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> and call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere gli elementi incorporati, ottenere un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>e chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called, any elements in that <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> are returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>chiamato, tutti gli elementi in tale <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>restituiti da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Unless you know the document is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, you should not call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A meno che non si conosce il documento è un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, non è necessario chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A>sul <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>

trans-unit.source: If the document is loaded from a network location, calling <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> on the entire document is resource intensive.
trans-unit.target: Se il documento viene caricato da un percorso di rete, la chiamata <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A>sull'intero documento è risorsa con utilizzo intensivo.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should use one of the methods on <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> that returns a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> that represents a portion of the document.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è necessario utilizzare uno dei metodi su <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>che restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>che rappresenta una parte del documento.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per il controllo associato a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref>in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the screen coordinates of the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> che rappresenta le coordinate dello schermo dell'elemento associato all'oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Il rettangolo di delimitazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements for the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di elementi figlio per il <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: Because <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> gives access to its content through <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern"></xref>, this method always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Poiché <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref> consente di accedere al contenuto tramite <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern"> </xref>, questo metodo restituisce sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome del <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "Document".
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene "Documento".

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that represents the clickable space that is on the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> che rappresenta lo spazio selezionabile che utilizza il <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>

trans-unit.source: The point that represents the clickable space that is on the element.
trans-unit.target: Il punto che rappresenta lo spazio selezionabile dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per il <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: If patternInterface is , this method returns an .
trans-unit.target: If patternInterface is , this method returns an .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> is understood by the end user as interactive or the user might understand the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref> è un elemento inteso dall'utente finale come interattivo o l'utente potrebbe considerare il <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref> come parte della struttura logica del controllo nel [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref> è fuori dallo schermo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà indica se l'elemento è visibile.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: In alcuni casi, un elemento è visualizzato sullo schermo, ma non è ancora visibile.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'elemento è nascosto da altri elementi, potrebbe non essere visibile.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, il metodo restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento non viene visualizzato sullo schermo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
